welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tallahassee, the charming capital city of Florida! Known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Uptown Cafe
restaurants.description: Uptown Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Tallahassee.

restaurants.name: The Lunchbox
restaurants.description: The Lunchbox is a american restaurant located in Tallahassee.
restaurants.address: 295 N Magnolia Dr (at E Tennessee St), Tallahassee, FL 32301

restaurants.name: Krispy Kreme
restaurants.description: Krispy Kreme is a donut shop located in Tallahassee.

restaurants.name: Tropical Smoothie Cafe
restaurants.description: Tropical Smoothie Cafe is a café located in Tallahassee.
restaurants.address: 209 N Magnolia Dr (Call St), Tallahassee, FL 32301

restaurants.name: Little Italy
restaurants.description: Little Italy is a italian restaurant located in Tallahassee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tallahassee Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is home to gates for American Airlines and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B houses gates for United Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
